body: $AAPL $SPY they crashed it so they could buy cheaper

$BTC.X "Bears" gives off notes of being a defiant counter trend market trading bad ass (not true I know..but it's a thing).  
 
$BTC.X isn't like shorting $AAPL because you think they'll miss earnings or some random bad news dropped.  No, being a BTC bear is by extension being a USD Bull....and no one with half a brain is bullish on the USD right now. 
 
We need to start calling BTC bears, USD bulls.  Maybe that context switch will turn the light on 😂

$GOOG $GOOGL $MSFT $AAPL $AMZN 

5 year gains

Google - 189%
Amazon - 224%
Microsoft - 319%
Apple - 357%

And google is the best growth and innovative company.

Hence I am buying only Google from the mega caps, on all dips. Imo, Google has much more upside than other mega cap companies
